page.title: 19A Farm In Our Area Described
page.content: Atway Farm is in the north east of our rectangle.The owners of the farm are Mr.& Mrs.Smale.Most of the buildings are made of local stone with some cob.The farm house and farm buildings are edged with red bricks because you dont usually find straight stones.Some of the sheds and barns were made of corrugated iron and also some galvanize.All the stones we saw were different.On the farm house on the west side of the wall is galvanize to protect the wall from the wind. Mr.Smale shares his farm equipment with his brother and father.They have five tractors (One big tractor and four small tractors.)1 forager,1 baler,4 trailers and a mower.They have seventy Friesian cows,16 bull calves,2 sheep and 4 lambs.They own 150 acres of farmland.120 acres for grass,30 for cereals.
